title.name: Academy
title.flavour text:
They came for enlightenment,
but were imprisoned by madness.

title.name: Acid Caverns
title.flavour text:
Clear water springs forth.
A moment of purity before it too gathers filth.

title.name: Acton's Nightmare
title.flavour text:
Curious, she shook it then,
And tiny screams emerged.
Curiouser, she shook again,
And an eerie silence purred.

title.name: Alleyways
title.flavour text:
An unwashed gutter, where wretches
cut purses and throats alike.

title.name: Arachnid Nest
title.flavour text:
Man is not the only beast to
bend nature to its will.

title.name: Arachnid Tomb
title.flavour text:
They feel your every move,
your every breath,
with a million little wires.

title.name: Arcade
title.flavour text:
We create so that some part
of us may remain after death.

title.name: Arena
title.flavour text:
The sound of a thousand calls
for blood echo for eternity.

title.name: Atoll
title.flavour text:
Time turns even the vicious
volcanoes to hollow shells.

title.name: Barrows
title.flavour text:
Man burrows for only
the eternal hibernation.

title.name: Basilica
title.flavour text:
Built so the prayers would echo.
A resonance no god could hear.

title.name: Bazaar
title.flavour text: Greed is the only god here.

title.name: Beach
title.flavour text:
A paradise, forever replenished by
endless waves teeming with life.

title.name: Bog
title.flavour text:
Layer upon layer of death and rot.
Disgusting.

title.name: Bone Crypt
title.flavour text:
The dead ask to be remembered,
but such requests
are seldom met.

title.name: Caer Blaidd, Wolfpack's Den
title.flavour text:
Howls and laughter
They hide in the day
They smell you, they watch you
They track their new prey

title.name: Cage
title.flavour text:
Treat a man like a wild animal,
and he will soon learn to bite.

title.name: Caldera
title.flavour text:
From the heart of fire, rivers
of burning rage billow forth.

title.name: Carcass
title.flavour text:
Life's wet, reproductive stink abates,
relenting to death's chaste ritual of decay.

title.name: Castle Ruins
title.flavour text:
When the castle falls,
it has failed its only purpose.

title.name: Cells
title.flavour text:
Life crushed together.
Left to crumble to dust.

title.name: Cemetery
title.flavour text: A stone forest of forgotten names.

title.name: Channel
title.flavour text:
The stone cannot stop the torrent.
It can only divert it.

title.name: Chateau
title.flavour text: Beauty and brutality in such close proximity.

title.name: City Square
title.flavour text:
Countless generations have
walked these time-worn stones.

title.name: Cold River
title.flavour text:
Ice forges a fickle path,
as those beneath its veil can attest.

title.name: Colonnade
title.flavour text:
Small minds demand
the largest structures.

title.name: Colosseum
title.flavour text:
Life means as little as a passing
moment of entertainment.
Let them rot.

title.name: Courthouse
title.flavour text:
Justice born of love is a surrender.
Justice born of law is a punishment.

title.name: Courtyard
title.flavour text:
An elaborate, beautiful garden,
hidden from the public. Selfish.

title.name: Coves
title.flavour text:
The dark seas swallow the careless
and spit them against sharp rocks.

title.name: Crimson Temple
title.flavour text: A sanguine supplication to death and depravity.

title.name: Cursed Crypt
title.flavour text:
Saints and heathens look the same
once the rot takes hold.

title.name: Daresso's Dream
title.flavour text: No matter how far you climb, you never escape the Pits.

title.name: Dark Forest
title.flavour text:
The trees grow twisted and gnarled,
without a hint of light.
A curse lingers here.

title.name: Death and Taxes
title.flavour text:
So the raiders danced,
leading their foe ever west,
towards certain death.

title.name: Doedre's Cesspool
title.flavour text: Spells of blood foul the waters below.

title.name: Doryani's Machinarium
title.flavour text: We are ever the makers of our own undoing.

title.name: Dunes
title.flavour text:
Shifting, morphing, expanding. A reminder
of the virtues of an agile mind.

title.name: Dungeon
title.flavour text:
A penitentiary for those who are not penitent
is nothing more than an inn for the evil.

title.name: Estuary
title.flavour text:
Where land springs from water,
life will shortly follow.

title.name: Excavation
title.flavour text:
Two unexplored frontiers remain:
The skies and the soil.

title.name: Factory
title.flavour text:
Repetition. Convention. Duplication.
Creation distilled to perfection.

title.name: Flooded Mine
title.flavour text:
In darkness, beast and man
alike clamour to survive.

title.name: Forge of the Phoenix
title.flavour text:
One of my captors refused redemption.
He did not see value in a new life.
Now new life surrounds him.

title.name: Forking River
title.flavour text:
Great stone towers tore at the natural order
and were promptly put in their place.

title.name: Frozen Cabins
title.flavour text:
The fleet lay stranded in the winter wastes,
those aboard to never again see the light of day.

title.name: Fungal Hollow
title.flavour text:
The water brings life,
the poison takes it away.

title.name: Geode
title.flavour text:
Many hands may
move a mountain.

title.name: Glacier
title.flavour text:
We must all walk the narrow, winding path.
The end is always the same.

title.name: Grave Trough
title.flavour text:
Does the land reject the dead,
or do the dead reject their fate?

title.name: Graveyard
title.flavour text:
Unknown legacies.
Untold stories.

title.name: Hallowed Ground
title.flavour text:
Some dead have long
envied the living.
When given the chance,
they take from us what they can.
So we offer our suffrage.
In return, they give
only suffering.

title.name: Haunted Mansion
title.flavour text:
Forlorn and sorrowful, this once opulent
ruin conceals the sins of a fallen line.

title.name: Highgate
title.flavour text: A frail scab of hope holds Nightmare at bay.

title.name: Highgate
title.flavour text: Survivors huddle 'neath baleful shadows of rot and decay.

title.name: Iceberg
title.flavour text:
Icy fangs seek tender hulls
to sink themselves into.

title.name: Infested Valley
title.flavour text:
Should we feel disgusted at how the weak predate
the strong, or should we feel... admiration?

title.name: Ivory Temple
title.flavour text:
Man and nature intertwined,
but only for the chosen few.

title.name: Kaom's Dream
title.flavour text: Fury and flame come to life.

title.name: Kaom's Stronghold
title.flavour text: A holdfast built of hubris.

title.name: Karui Shores
title.flavour text: The fates of two peoples now stand reversed, but history has taught the Oriathans humility and the Karui mercy.

title.name: Lair of the Hydra
title.flavour text:
One of my captors wore many faces,
yet kept her true face hidden.
Now she cannot escape her true face.

title.name: Lava Chamber
title.flavour text:
Fiend and fortune-hunter alike turned to ash.
A sorry alliance of unending agony.

title.name: Lava Lake
title.flavour text:
At the heart of a peaceful, secluded valley,
an island of burning, consuming fury.

title.name: Leyline
title.flavour text:
Amidst the barren wastes,
a slender strand of life blooms.

title.name: Lioneye's Watch
title.flavour text: Cold, dank and reeking of infection. That's how Hope fares in Wraeclast.

title.name: Lioneye's Watch
title.flavour text: The shivering tides bring little hope, only desperation and despair.

title.name: Lookout
title.flavour text:
A glorious vista once exclusive
to emperors. Not anymore.

title.name: Maelström of Chaos
title.flavour text:
Whispers from
a world apart
Speak my name
beyond the tomb;
Bound within
the Maelström's heart,
Will they grant me
strength or doom?

title.name: Malformation
title.flavour text:
Boils swell from the earth.
Foul malignant flesh
without purpose.

title.name: Maligaro's Sanctum
title.flavour text: The inner depths of decadent darkness.

title.name: Mao Kun
title.flavour text:
The Treasures of the Tides
wait in agony
at the End of the World.

title.name: Mausoleum
title.flavour text:
A vault for the dead, as if
they were valuable. Pathetic.

title.name: Maze
title.flavour text:
They live trapped forever in darkness
and confusion. We are no different.

title.name: Maze of the Minotaur
title.flavour text:
One of my captors felt no emotion.
He did not hesitate to inflict pain.
Now all he feels is intense, unstoppable agony.

title.name: Mesa
title.flavour text:
Barren and sun-bleached.
Emptiness as far as
the eye can reach.

title.name: Mineral Pools
title.flavour text:
God's jar of raw materials.
Life lying dormant,
waiting to sprout.

title.name: Moon Temple
title.flavour text:
Night's promises are dark, for
even the stars must be harvested.

title.name: Mud Geyser
title.flavour text:
Filth springs forth like blood
from a severed jugular.

title.name: Museum
title.flavour text:
Ancient artifacts and beautiful baubles.
All paid for in blood.

title.name: Necropolis
title.flavour text:
Even in death, we long to
be close to one another.

title.name: Oba's Cursed Trove
title.flavour text:
"Here the soil is more deadly
than any swing of the axe."
- Oba of the Karui,
Conqueror of Corruption.

title.name: Olmec's Sanctum
title.flavour text:
They flew, and leapt,
and clambered over,
They crawled, and swam,
and slithered under.
Still its ancient secrets
await unclaimed
And of this hidden temple,
only legends remain.

title.name: Orchard
title.flavour text: The fruit that grows from bloody ground tastes sweetest.

title.name: Oriath Docks
title.flavour text: A final refuge, backed hard against the waves of a raging sea.

title.name: Oriath Square
title.flavour text: What was once the heart of the city is now the heart of the battle.

title.name: Overgrown Shrine
title.flavour text:
A once great monument,
now a forgotten memorial.

title.name: Overseer's Tower
title.flavour text: Vengeance is the slave's ultimate reward.

title.name: Palace
title.flavour text:
Death forces even the most
determined of despots to
pass the crown.

title.name: Pen
title.flavour text:
Slaves held like cattle. A blood-soaked
revolution, just waiting to happen.

title.name: Phantasmagoria
title.flavour text:
Every movement is watched,
recorded, remembered.

title.name: Pier
title.flavour text:
Man's reach extends into
the ocean, clawing at
its infinite depths.

title.name: Pillars of Arun
title.flavour text: Man creates where nature cannot.

title.name: Pit
title.flavour text: Blood turns the soil to mud.

title.name: Pit of the Chimera
title.flavour text:
One of my captors hid a beast within his heart.
Now his true self can be seen by all.

title.name: Plateau
title.flavour text:
Steep cliffs divide where the trees
may grow, and where they may not.

title.name: Poorjoy's Asylum
title.flavour text:
Laughs of all the twisted
Echo through these
halls of gold.
In this cold forgotten void
They wander, forever uncontrolled.

title.name: Port
title.flavour text:
The wealthy foolishly battle
the ocean for domain.

title.name: Precinct
title.flavour text:
Crushed together and fenced in,
to live out their lives like cattle.

title.name: Primordial Blocks
title.flavour text:
Who is the true criminal, the one behind
bars, or the one who tortures him?

title.name: Primordial Pool
title.flavour text:
A dough of bad blood.
A yeast of ill will.

title.name: Prisoner's Gate
title.flavour text: The hunting grounds of a cloven god.

title.name: Prisoner's Gate
title.flavour text: The cliffs watch with goatish eyes.

title.name: Promenade
title.flavour text:
Even the greatest achievements
will eventually be abandoned.

title.name: Racecourse
title.flavour text: Rats chase their tails for the amusement of fools.

title.name: Reef
title.flavour text:
Each plank of rotting wood,
each dead sailor,
feeds the island and makes it grow.

title.name: Residence
title.flavour text: Home only to misery now.

title.name: Shavronne's Tower
title.flavour text: Echoes of the past bring new life to an old experiment.

title.name: Shore
title.flavour text: Each life, each act, as fleeting as footprints in the sand.

title.name: Siege
title.flavour text: No rest, no peace, no negotiation. Only War.

title.name: Silo
title.flavour text:
Grim blessings whispered in the deepest,
most secret of places.

title.name: Spider Forest
title.flavour text:
Each branch, each leaf,
an extension of a web
that spans sanity.

title.name: Stagnation
title.flavour text:
Aided by unrelenting rain,
rot devours new life at the first fumble.

title.name: Strand
title.flavour text:
Nothing good washes up
on this dark shore.

title.name: Sulphur Vents
title.flavour text:
The creatures that prowl the wildest extremes,
nature anoints with cruel efficacy to defend her.

title.name: Summit
title.flavour text:
We are swept ever upwards by our ambition,
with no thought of what awaits us at the peak.

title.name: Sunken City
title.flavour text:
From the walls, water, and ferns...
Death comes crawling on ancient steps.

title.name: Temple
title.flavour text:
Immaculate white stone rises
from the abyss. Perfection.

title.name: Terrace
title.flavour text:
A garden on a stone pedestal.
An incredible, and foolish, feat.

title.name: The Ancient Pyramid
title.flavour text: Two thousand years of regret.

title.name: The Aqueduct
title.flavour text: The rushing lifeblood of a long-dead Empire.

title.name: The Archives
title.flavour text: All the knowledge in the Empire could not save them.

title.name: The Ascent
title.flavour text: The greater the rise, the greater the fall.

title.name: The Ashen Fields
title.flavour text: Scorched earth and slumbering cinder.

title.name: The Bath House
title.flavour text: Hidden sin where revelry thrives.

title.name: The Battlefront
title.flavour text: Charred flesh and spilled bowels. Sweet and sour.

title.name: The Beacon
title.flavour text: An echo of destiny consumes the land.

title.name: The Belly of the Beast
title.flavour text: Once flushed with the warmness of blood, now festering; consumed by fungal rot.

title.name: The Belly of the Beast Level 1
title.flavour text: Enter the Nightmare.

title.name: The Belly of the Beast Level 2
title.flavour text: Enter the Nightmare.

title.name: The Blood Aqueduct
title.flavour text: A mighty spillway tainted by tarrish blacks and sanguine reds.

title.name: The Boiling Lake
title.flavour text: These corrosive waters devour both flesh and bone.

title.name: The Bridge Encampment
title.flavour text: Surviving rodents cling tight to cracks found in the masonry.

title.name: The Brine King's Reef
title.flavour text: A coral throne for a salt-soured god.

title.name: The Broken Bridge
title.flavour text: The stonework trembles atop this petrified land.

title.name: The Broken Bridge
title.flavour text: A pure, soothing river once red and clogged with the victims of war.

title.name: The Canals
title.flavour text: A man-made rupture from which both blood and water flow.

title.name: The Catacombs
title.flavour text: Coughing up the dust of dead devotion.

title.name: The Cathedral Rooftop
title.flavour text: Atop this burning monument to arrogance, Oriath's final hope remains.

title.name: The Cathedral Rooftop
title.flavour text: From above, the true scope of carnage is clearly espied.

title.name: The Causeway
title.flavour text: Primordial ruins guard antiquarian secrets.

title.name: The Cavern of Anger
title.flavour text: The air needles the skin with its frigid fury.

title.name: The Cavern of Anger
title.flavour text: Stalactites drip in mourning for an ocean queen.

title.name: The Cavern of Wrath
title.flavour text: The air needles the skin with its frigid fury.

title.name: The Caverns
title.flavour text: Two thousand years of regret.

title.name: The Chamber of Innocence
title.flavour text: In this holiest of sanctums, the High Templar communes with God and delivers His divine judgement.

title.name: The Chamber of Sins Level 1
title.flavour text: Decrepit ruins born again. A lusting evil stalks its halls.

title.name: The Chamber of Sins Level 1
title.flavour text: Phantom whispers of maniacal passion.

title.name: The Chamber of Sins Level 2
title.flavour text: Decrepit ruins born again. A lusting evil stalks its halls.

title.name: The Chamber of Sins Level 2
title.flavour text: Phantom whispers of maniacal passion.

title.name: The City of Sarn
title.flavour text: A harsh light on harsh sights.

title.name: The Climb
title.flavour text: The cliffs glower down like judges in session.

title.name: The Coast
title.flavour text: The cliffs echo the hungry madness.

title.name: The Coast
title.flavour text: The Ancestors return to conquer these shores once again.

title.name: The Control Blocks
title.flavour text: Sadists and cut-throats break both bone and brain.

title.name: The Control Blocks
title.flavour text: The illusion of control is swiftly severed by the blade of reality.

title.name: The Coward's Trial
title.flavour text:
For his sins
he was hunted in his sleep,
judgement wrought
of twisted nightmare.
The Coward bound
his dreams to stone,
awaiting another to walk
the path of true atonement.

title.name: The Crematorium
title.flavour text: Choked with ash and cinder.

title.name: The Crossroads
title.flavour text: Ancient cruelty tears through the cobbled intersection.

title.name: The Crossroads
title.flavour text: Life struggles where once it bloomed.

title.name: The Crypt
title.flavour text: Ancestral memories given life, then soured.

title.name: The Crypt Level 1
title.flavour text: Stones worn smooth by centuries of devotion.

title.name: The Crypt Level 2
title.flavour text: Stones worn smooth by centuries of devotion.

title.name: The Crystal Veins
title.flavour text: Gifts of the Beast, awaiting plunder.

title.name: The Den
title.flavour text: Sodden spores flourish and feast on decaying flesh.

title.name: The Den
title.flavour text: Hot and sour as the panting of a rabid bear.

title.name: The Descent
title.flavour text: A freezing drop to test one's resolve.

title.name: The Desecrated Chambers
title.flavour text: Mad men toil under smoking skies to pervert a holy sanctum.

title.name: The Docks
title.flavour text: Life pales in the wake of progress.

title.name: The Dread Thicket
title.flavour text: Dripping with anger and grief, the ancient thicket weeps.

title.name: The Dread Thicket
title.flavour text: Unfettered nature. Unchained ferocity.

title.name: The Dried Lake
title.flavour text: Bones of betrayal, ashes of purity.

title.name: The Ebony Barracks
title.flavour text: Polished surfaces reflect brutal efficiency.

title.name: The Feeding Trough
title.flavour text: Cries of torment and pathetic moans as the unholy banquet of flesh continues.

title.name: The Fellshrine Ruins
title.flavour text: A spirit of sadism blemishes the earth.

title.name: The Fellshrine Ruins
title.flavour text: The ground aches with desecration. The rain tastes of blight.

title.name: The Fetid Pool
title.flavour text: Sluggish waters simmering with decay.

title.name: The Flooded Depths
title.flavour text: Darkness chilled into stillness.

title.name: The Foothills
title.flavour text: The secrets of history lie hidden among layers of dirt and sand.

title.name: The Forest Encampment
title.flavour text: A remnant of civility in the wild.

title.name: The Grain Gate
title.flavour text: A barrier trembles before undying feet.

title.name: The Grand Arena
title.flavour text: Dripping blood and weeping flowers.

title.name: The Grand Promenade
title.flavour text: A favourite walk of noble lords, now fallen into disrepair.

title.name: The Harbour Bridge
title.flavour text: A dark unrest sends ribbons to war.

title.name: The Harvest
title.flavour text: Where dreams come to die.

title.name: The High Gardens
title.flavour text: Creeping dread chokes life from this thriving terrace.

title.name: The Imperial Fields
title.flavour text: The savagery of war stains both muck and mire.

title.name: The Imperial Gardens
title.flavour text: Nature outgrows the designs of Man.

title.name: The Karui Fortress
title.flavour text: The waters here, once stagnant and foul, now run clear with an ancient bloodlust.

title.name: The Ledge
title.flavour text: Dusty winds laden with the scent of bone, old and otherwise.

title.name: The Library
title.flavour text: All the knowledge in the Empire could not save them.

title.name: The Lower Prison
title.flavour text: Echoes of the past bring new life to an old experiment.

title.name: The Lower Prison
title.flavour text: The air is rich with despair and apparition.

title.name: The Lunaris Concourse
title.flavour text: Allegiances falter like the waning of the moon.

title.name: The Lunaris Temple Level 1
title.flavour text: Depravity is boundless.

title.name: The Lunaris Temple Level 1
title.flavour text: Gibbous beauty eclipsed by a sisters' feud.

title.name: The Lunaris Temple Level 2
title.flavour text: Depravity is boundless.

title.name: The Lunaris Temple Level 2
title.flavour text: Gibbous beauty eclipsed by a sisters' feud.

title.name: The Marketplace
title.flavour text: All the money in the world can't stop a world from ending.

title.name: The Mines Level 1
title.flavour text: Disease in the darkness.

title.name: The Mines Level 2
title.flavour text: Disease in the darkness.

title.name: The Mud Flats
title.flavour text: Mud and air seethes with warped life.

title.name: The Mud Flats
title.flavour text: Mud and blood make a fine war paint.

title.name: The Northern Forest
title.flavour text: Daylight is the exile here.

title.name: The Northern Forest
title.flavour text: Wooden sentinels tower above.

title.name: The Oasis
title.flavour text: A paradise hidden amongst sunbleached bones and blistering dunes.

title.name: The Old Fields
title.flavour text: Sick pastures, feverish to the touch.

title.name: The Ossuary
title.flavour text: The dead offer thanks, for they have been spared this final savagery.

title.name: The Ossuary
title.flavour text: The faithful dead watch over the city with hollow eyes.

title.name: The Putrid Cloister
title.flavour text:
Please take out your blades,
your whips, and your spikes.
Class is now in session.

title.name: The Quarry
title.flavour text: A monstrous terror stalks chthonic mines, yearning for the boundless sky.

title.name: The Quay
title.flavour text: The restless dead shift 'neath darkened waters.

title.name: The Ravaged Square
title.flavour text: A flourishing place of trade, barely recognizable amidst the countless deaths.

title.name: The Refinery
title.flavour text: Madness was visited upon those who dug too deep.

title.name: The Reliquary
title.flavour text: A trove of shameful relics displayed with pride.

title.name: The Reliquary
title.flavour text: Empty, broken shelves linger, looted and forgotten in the wake of this horrid war.

title.name: The Ridge
title.flavour text: The air is thin, the way is narrow.

title.name: The Riverways
title.flavour text: These violent waters carry portents of death.

title.name: The Riverways
title.flavour text: Once tamed rivers now running free.

title.name: The Rotting Core
title.flavour text: The putrid interior oozes and spoils.

title.name: The Ruined Square
title.flavour text: Oriath's bleeding heart is the main course in a terrible feast.

title.name: The Sarn Encampment
title.flavour text: A shaky peace descends, though swords will never rest.

title.name: The Sarn Encampment
title.flavour text: The forging ground of heroes, past and present.

title.name: The Sarn Ramparts
title.flavour text: A parapet shakes beneath a billowing sky.

title.name: The Sceptre of God
title.flavour text: The pinnacle of power. The height of hubris.

title.name: The Sewers
title.flavour text: What horrors lurk in the bowels of the city?

title.name: The Ship Graveyard
title.flavour text: Whispered agonies of the marooned dead.

title.name: The Ship Graveyard Cave
title.flavour text: A corpse's throat, exhaling death.

title.name: The Slave Pens
title.flavour text: In Oriath's darkest corner, the spark of rebellion ignites.

title.name: The Slums
title.flavour text: Only the wind whistles and whines here now.

title.name: The Solaris Concourse
title.flavour text: Conquered by the fog of war.

title.name: The Solaris Temple Level 1
title.flavour text: An empire at its height, reflected in polished gold.

title.name: The Solaris Temple Level 1
title.flavour text: Luminary flares extinguished by burning pride.

title.name: The Solaris Temple Level 2
title.flavour text: An empire at its height, reflected in polished gold.

title.name: The Solaris Temple Level 2
title.flavour text: Luminary flares extinguished by burning pride.

title.name: The Southern Forest
title.flavour text: Insidious pupa populate under sweltering heat.

title.name: The Southern Forest
title.flavour text: Lush and humid, sweating violence.

title.name: The Submerged Passage
title.flavour text: Slime, shadow, and sharp sharp teeth.

title.name: The Templar Courts
title.flavour text: Only those with faithful eyes may enter these solemn chambers unbidden.

title.name: The Temple of Decay Level 1
title.flavour text: Arachnoid servants dribble and drool, coveting pilgrim flesh to feed abhorrent desires.

title.name: The Temple of Decay Level 2
title.flavour text: Arachnoid servants dribble and drool, coveting pilgrim flesh to feed abhorrent desires.

title.name: The Tidal Island
title.flavour text: Despite the warming sun, the breeze here bites with fangs of ice.

title.name: The Tidal Island
title.flavour text: As the tide rises, hope is drowned.

title.name: The Torched Courts
title.flavour text: Fuelled by blood and chaos, a dark inferno engulfs the halls of justice.

title.name: The Torched Courts
title.flavour text: Pious priests once dealt cruel justice within these halls, now they both smoulder in silent agony.

title.name: The Toxic Conduits
title.flavour text: Spells of blood foul the waters below.

title.name: The Tunnel
title.flavour text: Unspeakable horrors filigree and haunt the nameless dark.

title.name: The Twilight Strand
title.flavour text: Hope was drowned here.

title.name: The Twilight Strand
title.flavour text: Those that now wash ashore seek no warmth or shelter, only to fill a bottomless void of pain and hunger.

title.name: The Twilight Temple
title.flavour text:
In the shadow of war,
all are eclipsed.

title.name: The Upper Prison
title.flavour text: The air is rich with despair and apparition.

title.name: The Upper Sceptre of God
title.flavour text: The pinnacle of power. The height of hubris.

title.name: The Vaal City
title.flavour text: Ancient and arcane, a civilisation lost to the dust of history.

title.name: The Vaal Ruins
title.flavour text: Shades scratching at imprisoning stone.

title.name: The Vastiri Desert
title.flavour text: Blustering sand, sharper than a bandit's blade.

title.name: The Vinktar Square
title.flavour text:
To the east, 
it cannot be seen.
To the west, 
it cannot be touched.
To the south, 
it cannot be remembered.
And to the north, 
it cannot be contained.

title.name: The Weaver's Chambers
title.flavour text: Shrouded in mourning silks.

title.name: The Western Forest
title.flavour text: What madness flitters and creeps through the darkened trees?

title.name: The Western Forest
title.flavour text: Bathed in the cool light of obsession.

title.name: The Wetlands
title.flavour text: A corpulent grub flails mindlessly, infesting the putrescent muck.

title.name: The Wetlands
title.flavour text: Corrupted waters, pouring from the Mantle above.

title.name: Thicket
title.flavour text:
Little light enters.
No life escapes.

title.name: Tower
title.flavour text: We ascend to great heights to commit low acts.

title.name: Tropical Island
title.flavour text:
The temptations of paradise
draw forth the good
and the bad alike.

title.name: Underground River
title.flavour text:
Life, like still water, becomes trapped.
Stagnant. Foul.

title.name: Underground Sea
title.flavour text:
Silent stillness. The waters are
as cold as they are black.

title.name: Vaal Pyramid
title.flavour text:
A good slave is driven by
only two thoughts:
service and sacrifice.

title.name: Vaal Temple
title.flavour text:
Voices. Visions. Violence.
They will haunt these grounds for all of eternity.

title.name: Vault
title.flavour text:
Wealth beyond imagining,
locked beyond reach.

title.name: Vaults of Atziri
Volcano
title.flavour text: Tremble in the might of the flames.

title.name: Wasteland
title.flavour text:
A white bone stripped of its fertile flesh.
Life spirals towards its end.

title.name: Waterways
title.flavour text:
A river in the sky, far from that
which so desperately needs it.

title.name: Whakawairua Tuahu
title.flavour text:
We all began life in darkness,
we shall all end it there.

title.name: Wharf
title.flavour text:
Reach out into the abyss,
and the abyss reaches back.
